overview: All ECE undergraduate academic advisement must be scheduled via ADVISOR LINK (https://advisor.gatech.edu/) or send an email to undergraduate@ece.gatech.edu. NO WALK-INS WILL BE ALLOWED IN THE ECE ACADEMIC OFFICE.
subscribeToECEEmailList: To subscribe to this list, do as follows: 1. From your GT email (any others will be rejected), send a message to sympa@lists.gatech.edu. 2. In the subject line of your email, type in: subscribe news_ugrads. 3. Leave the message body blank.

advisors.name: Barbara Howard
advisors.advises: Students with last name A-L who entered Georgia Tech as a freshman

advisors.name: Teresa Watkins
advisors.advises: Students with last name M-Z who entered Georgia Tech as a freshman
